mapper.select: select title,content,time from users join post_name on post_name.user_id = users.user_id where username = #{userName} and public_or = true order by post_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_name (state, user_id, title, content, public_or, time) VALUES (#{state}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{public_or}, CURRENT_TIME)
mapper.update: UPDATE post_name SET state = #{state}, user_id = #{user_id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, public_or = #{public_or}, time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{post_id}
